original_text: If I had not done among them the works that no one else did, they would not be guilty of sin, but now they have seen and hated both me and my Father.
korean_text: 내가 아무도 못한 일을 그들 중에서 하지 아니하였더라면 그들에게 죄가 없었으려니와 지금은 그들이 나와 내 아버지를 보았고 또 미워하였도다

sentences.original_text: If I had not done among them
the works that no one else did
they would not be guilty of sin
and hated both me and my Father
